subject: Technology
title: Pac-Man: Gaming's First Icon
description: A short lesson to help you apply Pac-Man: Gaming's First Icon.

hook.text: Most early games were about shooting. Pac-Man was about eating. And it changed who played games.

buildup.text: Designer Toru Iwatani wanted a game women would enjoy. He was inspired by a pizza with a slice removed.

discovery.text: Pac-Man had character, personality, and ghosts with distinct behaviors. Games could tell a story through play.

twist.text: Pac-Man became the first gaming mascot. It appeared on lunch boxes, cereal, and a hit pop song.

climax.text: It earned over $2.5 billion in quarters. Pac-Man proved games could be mainstream entertainment.

punchline.text: A pizza missing a slice became gaming's first celebrity.

quiz.question: What inspired the shape of Pac-Man?
options: A pizza with a slice removed
